response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the fridge. The next step is to take the pickle out of the fridge. However, before we can do that, we need to open the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Take the table knife out of the bottom cabinet
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Move to the fridge
(4) Take the pickle out of the fridge
(5) Move to the breakfast table
(6) Put the pickle on the breakfast table
(7) Put the table knife on the breakfast table
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
